title: More time to suggest productivity and slurry items
categories: Payments for equipment, technology and infrastructure

content.text: We recently asked you to help us shape the list of items under the Productivity and Slurry theme of the Farming Equipment and Technology Fund (FETF).
The survey was due to close on 3 July. However, in response to requests to keep the survey open for a little longer, we’ve extended the deadline to midday, Wednesday 12 July.
The survey is your opportunity to suggest productivity or slurry management equipment ahead of the next round.
Through the following surveys, we'd like you to tell us:
The current list of items can be found on GOV.UK.

We are keen to read suggestions, particularly items of equipment for use in forestry and horticulture. That said, we are interested to hear suggestions for new equipment used by any agricultural sector or industry group.
If you have any technical questions, please email the Rural Payments Agency (RPA) fetfenquiries@rpa.gov.uk.
